select n.id as note_id, n.title, n.topic_name as topic, n.type, n.img_uris, DATE_FORMAT(n.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, DATE_FORMAT(n.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time, u.nickname, u.avatar, IFNULL(nc.like_total, 0) as like_total, IFNULL(nc.collect_total, 0) as collect_total, IFNULL(nc.comment_total, 0) as comment_total from t_note n left join t_user u on n.creator_id = u.id left join t_note_count nc on n.id = nc.note_id where n.visible = 0 and n.`status` = 1
and n.id = #{noteId} limit 1

select u.id, u.xiaohashu_id, u.nickname, u.avatar, IFNULL(uc.note_total, 0) as note_total, IFNULL(uc.fans_total, 0) as fans_total from t_user u left join t_user_count uc on u.id = uc.user_id where u.id = #{userId}
